name: Away From Earth: Mars 3
description:
StoryLine
The world is in danger. Our water is running out. Our world resources are running out. As a player, your mission is creating a colony at Mars. You need to make Mars as liveable and invite humans from world to Mars. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities to make water & electric systems of Mars. Also people needs job so because of that you need to create factories and give people job.

GamePlay
First you need to start with looting items. There are three different material types. Iron, Gold and Diamond. Each building needs materials to craft. After you loot materials, you need to create a farming are in your colony to survive. You should almost care about your water and food need. After you take care of your self in Mars, you can start creating your own colony. You need to make colony houses. Each colony house has different capaties. In this way, each of them has different water&electric need. You need to create electric engines & water engines to make ecosystem of your colony. By doing that, you need to use your engineer abilities. After houses are done, you need to create some factories to give people job. They'll also need electric & water. Basically, it's your colony and your responsibilities.

Features
  • Level One Colony House: Needs low electric and water. It can handle only one person.

  • Level Two Colony House: Needs medium electric and water. It can handle three people.

  • Level Three Colony House: Needs high electric and water. It can handle five people.

  • Car Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job.

  • Ship Factory: A buisness building to give your 4 of people job.

  • Electric Engine for electric generation and a water engine for water needs.

  • 4 Types of Electric Cables.

  • 4 Types of Water Pipes.

  • Use Lazer Item Looter gun to loot materials.

  • Use destroyer gun to destroy what you've builded.

  • Fly System: You can fly wherever you want easly by pressing [F] key.
